pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, April 21, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and President of Inuit Tapiriit Kanatami Natan Obed will co-chair the meeting of the Inuit-Crown Partnership Committee.

John G. Diefenbaker Building
111 Sussex Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for opening remarks
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12:30 p.m.

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and President of Inuit Tapiriit Kanatami Natan Obed will make an announcement and hold a media availability. Minister of Crown-Indigenous Relations Marc Miller will also be in attendance.

John G. Diefenbaker Building
111 Sussex Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 4:00 p.m.
